content.question: If <math alttext="y equals, e raised to the 2 times sine x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="the second derivative of y, with respect to x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, 4 times the cosine squared of x, close parenthesis, times, open parenthesis, e raised to the 4 times sine x power, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 4 times sine x, times cosine x, close parenthesis, times, open parenthesis, e raised to the 2 times sine x power, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>sin</mi></mrow><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, negative sine x, plus cosine x, close parenthesis, times, open parenthesis, 2 times e raised to the 2 times sine x power, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, negative sine x, plus, 2 times the cosine squared of x, close parenthesis, times, open parenthesis, 2 times e raised to the 2 times sine x power, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>cos</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, negative sine x, plus, 2 times the cosine squared of x, close parenthesis, times, open parenthesis, 2 times e raised to the 2 times sine x power, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>cos</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
